1548410.name: Boopineer
1548410.description:
Booper is a robot who has lost his body. Booper lost most of his mobility and is left to struggle by bouncing and rolling in this precision platformer. While rolling, Booper will come across gears that will upgrade parts of his head such as his audio input, and robotic eyes. These upgrades will allow booper to see more of the world that he is attempting to leave behind if he ever loses his way. Help Booper get his body back by reaching the top.

Boopineer is a precision platformer. You move Booper with your keyboard. Payback those who have wronged Booper at the top. Sorry for the frustrations that this game brought about within you, hopefully Booper's smile is enough to get you through it. Some gears give you helpful shortcuts for those of you who have fallen from great heights.

"A" and "D" to roll, spacebar to jump.
Be accurate, be ready to jump. The best way to move, is to jump while rolling. This small combination of movement will take time to master.
